async delay(ms) {
  return new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms))
}


getHtml(data, feature) {
  this.createVue(data, feature)
  return `
  <div id="id-app">
    ... vue ç»„ä»¶ä»£ç 
  </div>
  `
}

async createVue(data, feature) {
  // å»¶è¿Ÿ500ms è°ƒç”¨
  await this.delay(500)
  new Vue({
    el: '#id-app'
  })
}
